fields.Label: Banners
fields.Description:
Vinyl banners

 

As low as 1.25 per square foot.

 

Use our online calculator to instantly price and place orders for a low-cost, custom size printed vinyl banners. Design your banner on our website or upload your own artwork or have New York Printing Solutions professionally design your banner. 

 

 

Choose from smooth indoor banners or more rugged, textured, waterproof and scuff resistant scrim banners. Scrim banners have a woven layer of polyester between 2 pieces of vinyl making these inexpensive vinyl banners both durable and tear resistant. Scrim banners can be used indoors and outdoors. 

 

Scrim banners are used as building wraps, billboards, retail store signage, and trade show signage.  For added durability, our banners have welded hems rather than less durable stitched hems around the edges of the banner.

 

Scrim banners are available in 13 oz vinyl and heavy-duty 18oz vinyl.

(Printing on both sides of the banner is available. Contact us for a quote)

 

Smooth indoor banners are available in 15 oz. vinyl.

fields.Label: Fabric Banners
fields.Description:
Fabric Banners

  • Dye-sublimation printing is the highest quality fabric printing option in the industry
  • Choose any custom Size As Large As 68" By 240”
  • Eye-Popping Print Quality With stunning Vibrant Colors
  • High-Quality Wrinkle-Resistant Fabric Banners
  • Flame Retardant
  • Washable, Durable & Very Light Weight
  • Easy To Store And Transport
  • Great for both indoor and outdoor use
  • Perfect for backdrops providing a non-glare background for flash photography

What is Dye Sublimation printing and why choose it over regular digital fabric printing

  • A Dye-sublimation printer utilizes heat to embed your design into the molecules of the fabric merging the ink with the fabric. Your design will never flake off and our banner is machine washable and very durable.
  • Colors are much more vibrant than printing with more common forms of fabric printing in which the ink only sits on top of the fabric and will eventually flake off over time.

Why choose New York Printing Solutions

  • Convenient messenger Delivery Or FREE Pick Up here on 38th Street.
  • 5 star rated on Yelp and Google
  • Low Online INSTANT PRICING With Easy Online Ordering
  • FREE Holes with Metal grommets are available
  • FREE Reinforced Stitched Edges are available
  • One or Two business day Rush service is available with non-dye sub printing
  • Visit us to discuss your project and to see and feel samples

Fabric Banners are ideal for

  • Trade Shows and Expos
  • Events and Seminars
  • Concerts and performances
  • Red Carpet Events
  • Whenever elegant Soft looking Signage is preferred
  • When you plan to reuse signage over and over again
  • In-Store Displays
  • Church/Organization Displays
  • Events, Birthdays, Special Occasions

Things To Remember:

If your design size does not match the size of the fabric you wish to order, insert your design into our online designer so you can resize it before placing your order. We offer design services if you require assistance.

fields.Label: Floor Stickers
fields.Description:
Social Distancing Custom Floor Stickers

Open your business safely with custom COVID 19 floor stickers. Our full-color vinyl indoor/outdoor floor decals have a scuff resistant textured laminate to protect your floor sticker in high traffic areas. Floor stickers are removable and leave no residue. Floor decals are available in almost any custom size.

Personalize your floor stickers with your custom message or just add your company logo and brand colors.

fields.Label: Foamcore Posters
fields.Description:
Foamcore Poster Printing

View instant pricing now for custom size foamcore poster printing and order online for Free pickup in NYC.

Or let us messenger any quantity and any size foam core boards for only $29 anywhere in Manhattan.

Design your foamcore poster using our award-winning online designer or upload your own files.

Foam core boards as large as 48" x 96". - Delivery only $29

Our beautiful, high-quality custom printed foamcore posters will increase brand awareness, inform and excite viewers at your store, trade show, or event. Easily visible, card card-body-positioned mounted posters on foamcore get attention!

Next day foamcore poster printing is available. Please contact us for a quote.

Delivery in Manhattan is available via messenger or courier service. You can select this option in your shopping cart during checkout.

fields.Label: Poster Printing
fields.Description:
Poster Printing

Our beautiful high-quality custom poster printing will make your brand look great with posters for your retail store, trade show, or event in NYC.

Our inexpensive online prices for custom posters, combined with our bespoke Manhattan quality, make our posters the best choice in NYC.

Custom size posters are available from a 50" wide maximum to hundreds of feet long.

Custom printed posters are rolled and easy to get around town. They are available for pickup on 38th Street in NYC or we can messenger the posters in Manhattan or we can ship them anywhere in the US via UPS.

Rush production is available for your poster printing. Please contact us and let us know your desired turnaround time.

Try our beautiful 27" x 40" movie posters and scientific posters.

 

Compare our poster printing prices by clicking here.

For all your large format digital printing and custom poster printing visit us today on 38th Street to see samples and a free consultation. If you are outside New York, call 212-989-6633, email or chat with us online.

 

Our photo quality posters are printed on high quality, bright white satin coated poster paper, 180GSM thick.

fields.Label: PVC Signs
fields.Description:
PVC (Sintra) Poster Board Printed Signs

PVC poster boards are also known as foam PVC, Trovicel®, and Sintra®.

Sintra signs have a low gloss matte finish and are great for high-resolution full-color printing. We print PVC poster boards in custom sizes up to 48" x 96". Printed PVC poster board rigid signs are lightweight and durable, waterproof, and suitable for both indoor and outdoor signage.

Our beautiful, high-quality custom printed PVC signs inform and excite viewers at your office, retail store, trade show, or event. Easily visible, card card-body-positioned durable PVC board signs allow you to communicate your message correctly.

 

What is the difference between Sintra (PVC) boards and Foam Core Boards?

We can print beautiful high-resolution images on both substrates, but PVC poster boards are more durable and more resilient than foam core poster boards.  PVC signage is are much less likely to dent or have the corners get crushed during transport. PVC / Sintra boards can be used over and over and often last longer than Foamcore boards.

fields.Label: Retractable Banners
fields.Description:
Retractable Banner and Stand - $89

Display your branding and message with our printed retractable banner and stand for only $89. The roll-up banner is beautifully printed in a size of 33" x 80". Our low price includes the metal stand, the printed banner, and a nylon carry case with handles for easy traveling.

Popular Uses for pop up retractable banners:

  1. Indoor Store POP Displays
  2. Event or Trade Show Signage displaying Promotions, Product Details, etc.
  3. Informational Signage in Offices
  4. Exit and Entry Signs at Seminars and Trade Shows

Retractable banners:

  1. Slim and lightweight make retractable banners easy to carry to your next tradeshow or event.
  2. FREE nylon carrying case included.
  3. High-resolution printing on a smooth banner.
  4. Our price includes both your custom printed banner and stand.
  5. Easy to set up your retractable banner. - No tools required.

 

Next-Day retractable Banners are usually available. Please contact us to confirm availability before ordering.

fields.Label: Table Covers
fields.Description:
Full-Color Table Covers only $269

Get attention by displaying your branding and message with a vividly printed, very durable, highest quality, dye sublimation printed 6-foot table cover.

 

Table covers:

  1. 100% Polyester Poplin Textile
  2. Full color, high-quality photographic images and Pantone color matching is available

Maximum imprint area is a huge 90" x 132"

Standard turnaround is 5-6 business days for up to 12 table covers. Additional quantities may require additional production time.

Next-Day table covers (call for availability) are digitally printed.

Care Instructions:
Machine wash cool, tumble dry on low heat and remove promptly, use steam iron or steamer at low setting. 

Delivery in Manhattan is available via messenger/courier service. You can select this option in your shopping cart during checkout.
